[ArrayMergeBehavior](./ts-json.arraymergebehavior.md)


</td><td>

Controls how arrays are merged when combining JSON values. - `'append'` (default): Existing array elements are preserved and new elements are appended - `'replace'`<!-- -->: Existing array is completely replaced with the new array
